alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 15 at 3:15PM PDT until October 15 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... Northeastern San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 615 PM PDT. * At 315 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Borrego Springs, southeastern Anza, Borrego Palm Canyon, Hwy S22 Between Ranchita And Borrego Springs, Los Coyotes Indian Reservation and Santa Rosa Mountain. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
